title: Parklandskab II
credit_line: Gift of Ambassador and Mrs. Benson E. L. Timmons III
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark; Sanya Bezencenet [1908-2010], ca. 1957 [1] Ambassador [1916-1991] and Mrs. Benson Ellison Lane Timmons, III, Southampton, NY, until May 12, 1977 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1977 [2].

Notes:
[1]. See curatorial file for correspondence from Mrs. Sanya Timmons (Sanya Bezencenet Timmons), dated October 11, 1976; it gives information about the acquisition of the panting from the artist while she was living in Copenhagen. Sanya Bezencenet married first Ernst Lubitsch in 1935 (she was known in Hollywood circles as Vivian Gaye); subsequently, she married Ambassador Timmons in 1964.
[2]. See curatorial file for correspondence between Mrs. Timmons and Leon Arkus, October 1976 to February 1977.
